c74object.name: fl.interval~
c74object.digest: Schedules frames at regular intervals, which can be adjusted using the interval parameter.
c74object.description: The output is an empty frame.

entry.name: 0. /interval [double]
entry.description: Sets the interval between frames in the units of the units parameter.

entry.name: 1. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used to set the interval between frames.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds [3] - hz
